name: Holo Platformer
description:
This is a prototype of a Hololive platformer i want to make, of course  in the later updates (if they ever come) there will be more maps, sound, new graphics, more movement options, animations, enemies and a lot more.

Well this is the first game i've ever released and the would like your opinion on the game even if it is a bad one, also your advice of how i can make the game better.
